reviews.text: Not a bad little station could be better if it had a departure's board and a ticket machine

This is a tiny, one platform station. Rarely will an Intercity train stop here, but it's alright for local trains. No ticket machine or departure board is present at this station so you have to rely on mobile tickets, ticket delivery, or collecting one at a nearby station if you ever stop by. The only thing that makes up for this station and is worth using is the fact that it is located in the middle of town meaning a lot of people will be able to walk home without needing a car or transport.
Clean platform but NO LIVE ARRIVAL/DEPARTURE BOARD which is a pain!!!!!!
A very basic single platform station. Many of the larger trains running to London and the like don't stop here. Very convenient for heading into town or up to Bristol though.
This bijou little drop-off doesn't have ideas above its station. Concise and functional.
